thread.section_title: Insight Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Insight Loans | insightloans.com
thread.title: George in NH
thread.title_full: Insight Loans reviewed by George in NH

author: George in NH
title: George in NH
text: When I started the house hunting process I was pretty well daunted as I have had bad experiences in the past. James Parshay contacted me from Insight and said all of the right things. More importantly he and his assistant Michelle Soto delivered on their promises. The did most of the heavy lifting in getting a terrific loan approved. They fielded questions from my wife and I throughout the process and really made the whole thing as easy as one could hope for. I can't recommend Insight enough.
